title: Ancient DNA Reveals That a Teenage Girl Chewed on This Wad of 'Gum' 10,500 Years Ago
description: Based on genetic material preserved in birch bark tar from Estonia, researchers found that the teen likely had brown hair and brown eyes

title: A new possibility for life: Study suggests ancient skies rained down ingredients
description: A CU Boulder-led study finds that Earth's early atmosphere could have produced key sulfur biomolecules essential for life, challenging long-held assumptions.

title: Super funds plunge billions into fossil fuel companies
description: Australia's largest super funds are propping up the expansion of coal, oil and gas projects with billions of dollars from workers' retirement savings.

title: Super funds plunge billions into fossil fuel companies
description: Australia's 30 biggest superannuation funds have invested more than $33 billion in companies that are expanding fossil fuels globally, according to research from an activist group.

title: Big super boosts fossil fuel investment to $33b despite green push
description: Market Forces says the superannuation industry is “greenwashing on an industrial scale”, after the investment advocacy group’s review of 30 large funds.
